data.message: Hasnat Azad my fb id had been disabled since 3 months. now I want to active again. but I don't know about it. pls solve this

replies.message: Hey 	Hasnat. If your Facebook account has been disabled, you'll see a disabled message when you try to log in. If you don't see this message then you're probably experiencing a login issue. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2b5MVE7. -Jordan
I submit ur ways.but dont get any confirmation msg
they disabled one of mine too i have sent in id's explained the situation to them over a month ago and still nothing i didn't do anything wrong and have had it for 6 yrs

énmegadtam a telefonszámom, miért kérnek személyi igazolvány másolatot? miért nem elég kapcsolat a mobil? nem tudok visszalépni a személyes oldalamra.. segíts, kérlek..vannak segítőim megadva, akik igazolnak..nem vetted őket figyelembe, így nem öröm számomra a facebook.
